tags.name: CostAllocationRules
tags.description: An API for creating and managing cost allocation rules within a billing account or enterprise enrollment. These rules can be used to reallocate cost between resources, filtered by Resource Group, Subscription, or Tag.

get.description: Get the list of all cost allocation rules for a billing account or enterprise enrollment.

200.description: List of cost allocation rules for the billing account or enterprise enrollment.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

post.description: Checks availability and correctness of a name for a cost allocation rule

parameters.name: costAllocationRuleCheckNameAvailabilityRequest
parameters.description: Cost allocation rule to be created or updated

200.description: Response of cost allocation rule name availability.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Get a cost allocation rule by rule name and billing account or enterprise enrollment.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create/Update a rule to allocate cost between different resources within a billing account or enterprise enrollment.

parameters.name: costAllocationRule
parameters.description: Cost allocation rule to be created or updated

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Delete cost allocation rule for billing account or enterprise enrollment.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ErrorResponse.description:
Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message. 

Some Error responses: 

 * 429 TooManyRequests - Request is throttled. Retry after waiting for the time specified in the "x-ms-ratelimit-microsoft.consumption-retry-after" header. 

 * 503 ServiceUnavailable - Service is temporarily unavailable. Retry after waiting for the time specified in the "Retry-After" header.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of rule list results if there are any.

sourceResources.description: Source resources for cost allocation. At this time, this list can contain no more than one element.

targetResources.description: Target resources for cost allocation. At this time, this list can contain no more than one element.

name.description: If resource type is dimension, this must be either ResourceGroupName or SubscriptionId. If resource type is tag, this must be a valid Azure tag

percentage.description: Percentage of source cost to allocate to this resource. This value can be specified to two decimal places and the total percentage of all resources in this rule must sum to 100.00.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request (e.g. '2020-06-01').

ruleNameParameter.name: ruleName
ruleNameParameter.description: Cost allocation rule name. The name cannot include spaces or any non alphanumeric characters other than '_' and '-'. The max length is 260 characters.
